Html:
Hi,
I was wondering if there as a tutorial or guide on how we can save user ratings and add them up them with the help connecting RateIt + json file + jQuery.

Is this possible yet?

Thanks for any advice!

You'll need some server side technology in order to save the results on your server.
That part is really outside the scope, and you will be able to find many resources on the web dealing with data storage on the server.
There is although a small example showing how to send a rating to the server. You can find it at the bottom of the examples page.
gidon, thank you so much for the rich response and helping me learn more.
